phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
I am impressed you found me.
But it appears that it is over now.
We are leaving before the other Magic Knights come back, Rades.
I will eventually kill you and make you into one of my toys.
Look forward to that, you little brat!
Not giving up is my magic!
What the hell are you doing, you little shit?!
You have the nerve to say that after hurting all those people?!
This is what you did to innocent people as you laughed about it!
We cannot afford to lose Rades, too.
We received orders from Master to come here, and look at you...
You are struggling against this lot.
I was only scratched... but thanks to that curse, the bleeding will not stop.
It looks like the tables have turned!
I would always close my eyes
Of just making excuses to give up
I do not want to be near you
(The decisive battle is still a long way off)
I will give up on giving up
And get the world on my side
I am looking for the reason I am alive
Every time somewhere under this sky
And head where the light shines
I want to keep my promise
I will deliver it to you
Has the enemy been taken care of?
I hope the Magic Knights are okay.
He struck himself with his own swords to get rid of the curse?
All I have ever faced since I was born... was adversity.
No matter how many come at me, no matter what happens,
I will blast them all away!
It seems he is lost his mind in the face of our numbers.
He is about to die anyway.
There is no use in fighting.
You need to learn when to give up.
So this is the anti-magic brat our master spoke of.
Your exuberance may be your greatest weapon, but keep a cool head, too.
If you truly wish to become the Wizard King, that is.
I will stay calm... while I kick their butts!
You think I am going to let you people throw your weight around
after what you did to my brother?!
Let me join you, my rival!
They say beasts are more formidable when they are wounded.
What the hell are you doing?!
But we will kill them now!
Do not think that you can kill my friends so easily!
That is quite the defensive spell.
Judging from your appearance, you must be a member of the royal Silva family.
In that case, I will use my grimoire against you.
I would not want to be rude.
What are you planning to do?
I have never seen anything like this before!
How dare you send us that far away?
They managed to return here from that distance so quickly?
We really did not want to, but we all worked together to get back.
I suppose you could call it super compound magic.
Joining forces once in a while is not so bad.
Well, I guess men are not completely useless.
I am never working with them again.
We really do not play well with others.
But our nine Magic Knights squads exist
solely to protect the peace of the Clover Kingdom!
Mimosa, please take care of Captain Fuegoleon.
How could something like this happen to someone like Captain Fuegoleon?
Not to mention Leopold and Asta...
They put Captain Fuegoleon and the others in such a state.
It will cost us if we keep fighting.
Do not be in such a hurry.
My magic will just pierce through magic like that.
Dark Magic Item: Special Properties Plus Alpha... absorbed!
They managed to deflect the captain's magic as if it were nothing!
What do you plan to do with him?
We are the Eye of the Midnight Sun...
The ones who will destroy the Clover Kingdom.
My magic will just pierce through magic like that.
Dark Magic Item: Special Properties Plus Alpha... absorbed!
They managed to deflect the captain's magic as if it were nothing!
What do you plan on doing with him?
We are the Eye of the Midnight Sun...
The ones who will destroy the Clover Kingdom.
It is unfortunate, but we have no way of tracking them.
Right now, strengthening the royal capital's defenses takes priority.
There is no guarantee that those were the only enemies.
We do not have any time or magic to spare on someone like him.
How are Fuegoleon and Leopold doing?
The best I can do with my magic is first aid!
He needs to be taken to the medical ward for more advanced healing magic, or he will...
The Vermillions sure are not what they used to be.
Makes me embarrassed to be a royal.
Solid, how could you say that?
Our existence is pointless unless we win.
This is going to ruin the reputation of the Crimson Lion Kings...
As we were not present at the fight, we are even less than he is.
Strengthen the defenses so that there will not be further damages.
They have spread around magic that blocks transmission spells,
and the chain of command is in chaos.
Because of that, reinforcements from outside the Noble Realm could not arrive.
We cannot let our guard down yet.
Sol, we are going to reinforce the area.
Do not let your guard down.
Looks like we will have to wait on dessert a little while longer.
Klaus, go to headquarters and get reinforcements.
Rades, we ended up with a huge headache because you stepped out of line.
Do not get carried away just because the master has taken a liking to you.
How dare you say, I want to fight a captain alone.
I want to lay waste to the capital?
If you would just done what you were told, we would not have to go through all this trouble.
My toys were the victims in all of this!
This does not concern any of you!
I heard that Catherine was captured, though.
Who the hell cares about that old hag?
We got what we went there for, so who cares?
We will not be able to take that brat with us.
This is on a different level than a mere magic-weakening effect!
I am going to use him in my research!
Only those acknowledged by the master can go there.
Do not because any more unnecessary trouble.
Kill him before our master arrives.
I will make him into my toy!
I have been captured by the enemy?
You should help me convince them!
I want to study everything about you and your grimoire, and do some experiments,
and then dissect you in the end!
You want every last cell of yours to help with my research, right?
And this is a super bad situation!
I will ask properly, so please?
Do not blame me for whatever happens.
I have been waiting for you.
It would have been too difficult with your numbers...
Restraining all of you, I mean.
You guys attacked the royal capital, right?
You did not actually kill people without being ready to die yourselves, did you?
Crap... I do not have any magic left...
That being said, you all seem pretty skilled.
You will probably give me some trouble.
I will let one of you survive, so why not surrender?
It will be first come, first served.
How is he moving like that?!
I guess I do not have a choice.
I might be able to handle these numbers.
I guess I was able to restrain all of you.
Were you more worn out than I thought?
See how it feels to live in one unending moment.
We seem to be connected by fate somehow.
He managed to take care of all of them despite how strong they were.
This is the Wizard King's power?
You want to become the Wizard King someday, right?
In that case, watch carefully and do not look away.
This is only a small fraction of what you will have to surpass.
He is the strongest mage in the kingdom that I need to surpass!
I cannot stop shaking after witnessing the Wizard King's power firsthand!
I guess you did not need my help.
All of you had some interesting magic.
I have some questions for you all.
What are these jewels and this stone slab?
I have never seen these characters or patterns before.
What are you trying to accomplish with this?
Well, it is not like you can answer that while you are in that spell.
I guess we can take our time back at the Clover Kingdom to talk about this.
My dry emotions gaze at the me from that day
(I cannot find a place to go)
Even the faintest light can still break through the darkness
And change the flow of time
In order to grasp my endless dream
If there is a path that I should choose
Until my life comes to an end
I will accept any pain that comes my way
(We can try again, we can try again)
Even if we cannot see tomorrow
Holding onto feelings too intense to voice
I will keep screaming them in my heart
If you put him in a bowl, he is delicious.
The Wizard King himself showed up!
I wonder if he would become my sample.
If you want to be researched, come see me, Sally!
